channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Plants2Gardens
channel.desc: Specialising in mature plants for instant impact, Plants2Gardens offer a huge array of vibrant, colourful blooms to help transform your outdoor space and bring your garden to life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: QVC Selection
channel.desc: With specially chosen products from across the QVC range, there's something for everyone in the QVC Selection.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: In the Garden with Thompson & Morgan
channel.desc: Enjoy gorgeous plants and flowers in your garden from Thompson & Morgan, one of the UK's oldest horticulture firms and an established household name for gardeners across the country.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: SFIXX Home & Garden Solutions
channel.desc: SFIXX was founded with a simple idea in mind - to offer problem solving solutions for all. In this show it's all about the garden, with handy products to help you upkeep your outdoor space.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Nassif MD Skincare
channel.desc: Join us for this exciting new beauty range developed by Dr Nassif. Nassif MD Dermaceuticals is a range of anti-ageing skincare products designed to help maintain skin's health at any age.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Stylish Outdoor Space
channel.desc: Let QVC help you make the most of your garden this summer with a variety of products designed to take the stress and hard work out of those traditionally mundane garden chores.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: GOLD x QVC
channel.desc: Join us to discover some of the finest gold jewellery pieces that QVC has to offer. 9 carat, 14 carat, 18 carat; rose and white gold: explore the fabulous varieties of this most classic material.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Today's Top Tech
channel.desc: Want to know what's hot in the world of electronics? Tune in and explore the latest innovations in TVs, computers, tablets, cameras and more from the leading brands you know and trust.
